data.actual_result: You only see the option to mute/deafen when right clicking from the server list
data.expected_result: You should see the option to mute/deafen when right clicking from chat
data.short_description: Can not mute/deafen yourself when right clicking a message
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server or DM and right click your avatar in the channel - Observe the context menu - Right click your profile from the member list - Observe the context menu again
